headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Seven New Deadline Arenas and Triple Rewards for All Combatants
content:
Some visions of the future are brighter — more neon and explosive — than others. Deadline is one such vision, complete with matching light-up jumpsuits and helmets. This week brings seven new arenas to the cutting-edge game mode across some of the city’s most notorious landmarks — and they’re paying out 3X GTA$ & RP all week long.

Plus, play a round of Deadline and purchase the Shotaro before June 30th to receive a GTA$750,000 rebate (available within 72 hours of logging in after June 30th).
